CommandDoccommentNode.comment: `by_cases (h :)? p` splits the main goal into two cases, assuming `h : p` in the first branch, and `h : ¬ p` in the second branch. -/

AtomNode.val: `by_cases (h :)? p` splits the main goal into two cases, assuming `h : p` in the first branch, and `h : ¬ p` in the second branch. -/

OtherNode.state_before: c : Prop inst✝ : Decidable c α : Sort u_1 t : α ⊢ (if c then t else t) = t

CommandDoccommentNode.comment: A function applied to a `dite` is a `dite` of that function applied to each of the branches. -/

AtomNode.val: A function applied to a `dite` is a `dite` of that function applied to each of the branches. -/

OtherNode.state_before: α : Sort u_1 β : Sort u_2 f : α → β P : Prop inst✝ : Decidable P x : P → α y : ¬P → α ⊢ f (dite P x y) = if h : P then f (x h) else f (y h)

CommandDoccommentNode.comment: A function applied to a `ite` is a `ite` of that function applied to each of the branches. -/

AtomNode.val: A function applied to a `ite` is a `ite` of that function applied to each of the branches. -/

CommandDoccommentNode.comment: A `dite` whose results do not actually depend on the condition may be reduced to an `ite`. -/

AtomNode.val: A `dite` whose results do not actually depend on the condition may be reduced to an `ite`. -/

OtherNode.state_before: P : Prop α✝ : Type u_1 x : α✝ inst✝ : Decidable P ⊢ (if P then some x else none) = none ↔ ¬P
OtherNode.state_after: P : Prop α✝ : Type u_1 x : α✝ inst✝ : Decidable P ⊢ P → False ↔ ¬P

OtherNode.state_before: P : Prop α✝ : Type u_1 x : α✝ inst✝ : Decidable P ⊢ P → False ↔ ¬P
P : Prop α✝ : Type u_1 x y : α✝ inst✝ : Decidable P ⊢ (if P then some x else none) = some y ↔ P ∧ x = y
P : Prop α : Type u_1 inst✝ : Decidable P x : P → α ⊢ (if h : P then some (x h) else none) = none ↔ ¬P
P : Prop α : Type u_1 inst✝ : Decidable P x : P → α y : α ⊢ (if h : P then some (x h) else none) = some y ↔ ∃ h, x h = y
